text: Abdus Sattar Akon (1929â€“2012) was a Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami politician and the former Member of Parliament of the constituency Bagerhat-4. == Career == Akon was elected to parliament from Bagerhat-4 as a Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami candidate in 2001. == References == Category:Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami politicians Category:Politicians from Khulna Division Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths
title: Abdus Sattar Akon
